import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import TodoItem from './TodoItem' function TodoList(props){ const { items, updateTodosToShow, clearList, handleDelete, handleEdit, handleDoneTask, handleDeleteDoneTasks } = this.props return (

TodoList

{ items.length === 0 ? '' :
    { items.map(item => { return ( handleDelete(item.id)} handleEdit={() => handleEdit(item.id)} handleDoneTask={handleDoneTask} /> ) }) }
} ) } export default TodoList
